# Meszno, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Meszno  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Dubeninki, within Gołdap County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  west of Dubeninki,  east of Gołdap, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
